text:
@realDonaldTrump @EricTrump Have you finished sprinkling the supersparkly fairy dust, proven to destroy the COVID-19 virus, over the rest of the red states yet?

If you have, then fling open those doors, Fairy Donfather, & let farmers start planting those Trump greenbacks so we'll have a bumper crop by fall
